name: Energy Bridges
description:
Energy Bridges  – A puzzle platforming game which has no jumping, instead the player must create energy bridges to traverse across the land in order to reach the next checkpoint flag.

The main mechanics of the game involve objects called Bridge Cannons which fire out a hit scan projectile called a Bridge End one for each cannon respectively. Once both bridge ends have been placed the player may active the bridge allowing them to walk across it traversing the land trying to reach the next checkpoint flag.

The player must think about their actions and plan ahead to complete the puzzle.

This is a test demo, I would love any constructive feedback about the game. I would also love any ideas for the game that you have and would enjoy talking about it with you.

To play download the ZIP File, then extract that zip file and load  EnergyBridges1.5.exe

My fastest time beating the game was 10.35.67 Lets see if you can beat it >:)

I hope you enjoy :>
